title: Dad making money abusing his kids on Youtube.
body:
It's just a prank bro.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OUO-gNaGTec

http://imgur.com/gallery/y4P2U

As someone who went through a lot of mental abuse growing up it makes me physically sick watching the shit they put this kid through. This is like watching a documentary on how to create a killer. 20 bucks says this kid shoots his family or his school one day.
